sentences.en: Aim : To elucidate the relationship between Bone Morphogenetic Protein ( BMP ) and cell apoptosis.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨骨形成蛋白 ( BMP ) 与细胞凋亡的关系及意义.

sentences.en: AIM: To explore the expression of bone morphogenetic protein (BMP) in transplantation healing with massive bone allograft and the significance by animal experiment.
sentences.cn: 目的：通过动物实验来探讨骨形态发生蛋白在大段同种异体骨移植愈合中的表达及其意义。

sentences.en: As an osteocarcinoma - associated antigen, bone morphogenetic pro tein ( BMP ) is of significant in the clinical study of osteocarcinoma.
sentences.cn: 骨形成蛋白 ( BMP ) 作为一种骨肿瘤的相关抗原, 在骨肿瘤的临床医学研究中具有重要意义.

sentences.en: Bone morphogenetic proteins ( BMPs ) play an important role in Vascular calcification.
sentences.cn: 其中骨形成蛋白在血管钙化中扮演着重要的角色.

sentences.en: Bone morphogenetic proteins inhibit the tumorigenic potential of human brain tumour - initiating cells.
sentences.cn: 骨形成蛋白能抑制人类脑部肿瘤起始细胞的致瘤潜能.

sentences.en: But he believes morphogenetic fields can be reduced to standard chemistry and physics.
sentences.cn: 但是他认为形态发生场所会被周围的化学或物理作用而削弱.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the gene expression of bone morphogenetic protein ( BMP ) in human cervical disc.
sentences.cn: 目的: 了解骨形态发生蛋白 ( BMP ) 在椎间盘退变、突出过程中是否有表达.

sentences.en: Objective To clone the human recombined bone morphogenetic protein 2 ( BMP 2 ) gene in Escherichia coli.
sentences.cn: 目的:在大肠杆菌中 克隆人 骨形成蛋白2基因.

sentences.en: Objective To demonstrate the direct effects of fluoride on activities of bone morphogenetic protein ( BMP ).
sentences.cn: 目的研究氟对骨形态发生蛋白 ( BMP ) 活性的直接作用.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the relationship between bone morphogenetic protein ( BMP ) and development of fetal cranial bones.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨骨形态发生蛋白 ( BMP ) 与人颅顶骨发生及发育的关系.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To investigate the effect of Amicoumacin B on bone morphogenetic protein - 2 ( BMP - 2 ) gene.
sentences.cn: 目的研究AmicoumacinB对骨形态形成蛋白因子 ( BMP -2 ) 基因的作用.

sentences.en: Results Bone morphogenetic proteins showed no expression in iliac bone marrow.
sentences.cn: 结果骨形成蛋白在不同年龄髂骨髓质骨中均为阴性表达.

sentences.en: TGF - � � superfamily molecules consist of over 30 memb ers including TGF - � �, bone morphogenetic protein ( BMP ) and so on.
sentences.cn: 转化生长因子β(transforminggrowthfactorβ,TGFβ)超家族分子包括TGFβ 、 骨形态发生蛋白 ( BMP ) 等30多个成员.

sentences.en: The role of allograft , autograft, plate fixation, and bone morphogenetic protein is not entirely clear.
sentences.cn: 同种异体骨移植 、 自体骨移植 、 内固定以及骨形成蛋白所扮演的角色仍然研究得不够深入.

sentences.en: There, scientists have been manipulating the levels of bone-morphogenetic protein or BMP in the brains of laboratory mice.
sentences.cn: 在那里，科学家已经成功操纵了小白鼠大脑中的骨形态发生蛋白（或称BMP）的水平。

trans.tran_cn: 有关形态发生的，有关器官形成的
